entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
